rules.reasoning: Detected {data.get('count')} temporary files in the Cassandra data directory at /var/lib/cassandra/data. Temporary files often result from interrupted operations like compactions, repairs, or streaming, and can accumulate to waste disk space, potentially leading to storage exhaustion and performance degradation.
recommendations: List all temp files for review: 'find /var/lib/cassandra/data -name '*tmp*' -type f -ls'
Safely remove confirmed unnecessary files: 'rm -f <file_path>' (verify no active processes use them)
Examine Cassandra logs: 'tail -f /var/log/cassandra/system.log' for errors related to failed operations
Implement monitoring: Set up alerts for temp file count exceeding thresholds
Prevent accumulation: Tune compaction settings or investigate application write patterns if recurring
